name: df-dvdsr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cdsr, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wrex(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ ||r =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(s3[(√ó ` s0)]s1)= s2))})
comment: Define the (right) divisibility relation in a ring. Access to the left divisibility relation is available through ` ( ||r `` ( oppR `` R ) ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
